title: GRannie

replies.body:
Because nothing is cooler to young gamer kids than old people.
The biggest problem I see with this, is it just wouldn't sell that well. And if it won't sell, why make it?

I see your point. However kids do like puns, if this was done clever enough it would work. 
It would also be a good insult they could use "you got beat by an old lady" which I do think they would appreciate.
I fully agree it probably wouldn't sell as well as the arcade skins, or pool party. I do think there would be a market for it.
I was hoping for some feedback that wasn't aimed at my imperfect grammar. fixed.
